sourcesContent: import styled from "styled-components" import { Announcement } from "../components/Announcement" import { Navbar } from "../components/Navbar" const Container = styled.div`` const Title = styled.h1` text-align: center; margin: 10px 0; ` const ProductContainer = styled.div` ` const ProductList = styled.div` display: flex; justify-content: space-between; padding: 20px; ` const Button = styled.button`` const TopTexts = styled.div`` const TopText = styled.span`` const ProductDetailsCont = styled.div` padding: 30px; display: flex; ` const ProductDetails = styled.div` display: flex; flex: 3; ` const ProductSummery = styled.div` flex: 1; ` const ProductItem = styled.div` flex: 2; display: flex; ` const Image = styled.img` width: 200px; ` const ProductInfo = styled.div` display: flex; ` const ProductName = styled.span`` const ProductId = styled.span`` const ProductColor = styled.div` width: 50px; height: 50px; border-radius: 50%; background-color: black; ` const ProductSize = styled.span`` const ProductInfoLeft = styled.div` padding: 20px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: space-around; ` const ProductPrice = styled.div` flex: 1; background-color: teal; ` export const Cart = () => { return ( YOUR BAG shopping list your bag Product: kahlid ali ID: 06541851 Size: 37.5 1 order summery ) }
